title: Helpdesk System
content:
A customised Electronic Helpdesk System was developed, with the following features:

  1. Multiple Users, Categories and Priorities
  2. Customer login to view ticket status
  3. Automatic notification via email and SMS when a new ticket created or updated
  4. Hosted solution so anyone can access it

title: Plumbers System Management
content: We developed software for a large plumbing business. The software handles everything from the moment a client calls in with a problem, right up to the invoicing.

title: Client Database Management
content:
This system was developed for a client, and modified for a few others, to provide them with a custom solution to manage their client information.

This included:

  1. SMS integration for notifications
  2. Automated debit order runs integrated with a provider

title: Recruitment Agency Management
content: We developed a customised solution for a recruitment agency that included online psychometric tests for applicants to complete.

title: Waybill Management System
content: We developed software for a big courier company to keep track of their waybill numbers. This enabled them to log and scan in their waybill numbers. Other users are then able to search the database.

title: Content Management Systems
content: We have developed our own, as well as extended and customised open source, solutions for the online content management system market. This included Drupal, Joomla and Wordpress.

title: Ecommerce
content:
We have developed our own, as well as extended and customised open source, solutions for the online ecommerce market. This included Drupal Ubercart, OSCommerce and OpenCart.

This included integration with online payment systems for credit card processing and automated shipping calculation.

title: Multilevel Marketing Management System
content:
We development a membership management system for a multilevel marketing business that deals with around 400,000 members.

This included integration into their own base system where information is fed into the database.

title: Cryptocurrency Exchange System
content:
I am part of a team that has developed an online trading platform for various cryptocurrencies. My role is the lead developer, as well as working closely with the system administration and system analyst teams.

I have been exposed to, and assisted with, setting up various blockchain solutions and cryptocurrency wallets. Once these were set up I also had to integrate them into our various systems.

The system is also integrated into accepting EFT bank payments.

title: Ticket Management System
content: I was tasked to do customisation on an opensource ticket management system (OSTicket). This involved a number of bespoke changes and integrating it with another time management system.

title: Stock Control System
content:
I worked on a stock control system for a security company. This involved setting up a system for managers and stock controllers to manage the ordering and approval process for their guards.

The system was developed to work on mobile devices where the users were able to use electronic signatures that were saved for legal purposes.

It was built on the Laravel PHP framework.

title: Lead Developer on various projects
content:
I have been contracted to a number of companies where I performed the duties of a hands on lead developer and as a consultant.

The duties included managing various developers, providing feedback on current and future systems and providing code reviews.
